idea:
Due to COVID, agility and digitisation are necessary to grow and manage costs.  Need proper advice to make organization agile, select and implement technology properly but full time CTO is very costly! No platform to engage a part time CTO!

myCTO is online platform for companies to select & engage relevant part time CTO – i.e. get proper advice. Companies engage only for required timeframe thus at optimum cost. It will be a platform for CTO’s to learn, grow and become entrepreneurs! 

Platform will allow companies to register and list requirements, registered ex. CTO’s/ technology heads/ agile practitioners will bid for projects. Companies select, engage, pay and give feedback on services provided

Target market will be small and medium enterprises

Timing is correct due to covid triggered digitization, significant change in revenues and ability to service distinct customer has increased

As compared to competitors, our USP will be focus on technology profile, ability to record time, raise bills and get payments/ ratings. Technology people will be able to share knowledge

Business model will be leveraging open source technology, digital marketing

Revenue model will be percentage of partner billing, ads on platform and technology trainings
name: myCTO

idea:
Deeptesh Verma

Deeptesh Verma (born August 15, 1981) is an Indian businessman, entrepreneur and actor. He is the chairman and director of the social networking website Deeptesh Verma Micro Employee Services.

Personal life

Deeptesh met his future wife Ashwini Raut via a mutual friend in the most auspicious period of a Hindu’s life – Ganesh Chaturti. They dated for a while before getting married at Mumbai (2010). He is today blessed with a daughter Ava. Ava is Eight-year-old Mumbai resident.
name: Deeptesh Verma

idea: BatteryBoss.in a leading online battery store in India, is created as a simple and quick method for one to purchase batteries at competitive costs either online or via phone. Our costs quoted by web or by phone are completely inclusive of GST. We import batteries directly from the certified suppliers, enabling the consumer, you, to reap the benefits of not only exceptionally competitive costs but also by having direct access to superior quality products.
name: Battery Boss
